sourcesContent:
import dateNormalization from "../utils/functions" const Movie = (movie) => { return (

{movie.name ? `${movie.name} (${movie.original_name})` : `${movie.title} (${movie.original_title})`}

{movie.genres.map(genre => genre.name + " - ")}{movie.runtime + " mins."}

Estreno: {movie.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(movie.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(movie.release_date)}

Puntuacion de usuarios: {movie.vote_average} %

Cantidad de votos: {movie.vote_count}

{movie.tagline}

Vista general:

{movie.overview}
) } export default Movie
